episodes.title: Rainforest Shmainforest
episodes.plot: The gang gets lost in the rain forest after going to Costa Rica with a singing tour.

episodes.title: Spontaneous Combustion
episodes.plot: Randy Marsh becomes a national hero after he discovers the reason why South Park residents are spontaneously combusting. Meanwhile, Kyle and Stan have a plan to help Kyle's dad get a res-erection.

episodes.title: The Succubus
episodes.plot: The boys try to save Chef from a woman who is stealing him from them. Meanwhile, Cartman gets glasses.

episodes.title: Jakovasaurs
episodes.plot: A surviving breed of dinosaur is discovered in South Park, but no one but Cartman can stand them.

episodes.title: Tweek vs. Craig
episodes.plot: The boys pit two classmates against each other for entertainment. Meanwhile, Kenny takes a home economics class.

episodes.title: Sexual Harassment Panda
episodes.plot: South Park Elementary is nearly bankrupt when Cartman sues Stan for sexual harassment.

episodes.title: Cat Orgy
episodes.plot: Cartman deals with an abusive babysitter, her boyfriend, and a cat in heat when his mother goes to a party.

episodes.title: Two Guys Naked in a Hot Tub
episodes.plot: Stan is stuck playing with Butters and Pip at a party. Meanwhile, Randy and Gerald experiment with their sexuality.

episodes.title: Jewbilee
episodes.plot: Kenny comes with Kyle to Jewish Camp and almost witnesses the destruction of the Jewish faith.

episodes.title: Korn's Groovy Pirate Ghost Mystery
episodes.plot: The rock band Korn visits South Park during Halloween to solve the mystery of the pirate ghosts that are terrifying the town.

episodes.title: Chinpokomon
episodes.plot: The kids get hooked on a brainwashing violent cartoon from Japan which turns them against the American government.

episodes.title: Hooked on Monkey Fonics
episodes.plot: The boys have a hard time relating to two new students who have been home schooled.

episodes.title: Starvin' Marvin in Space
episodes.plot: The government tries to hunt down Starvin' Marvin after he steals an alien spaceship.

episodes.title: The Red Badge of Gayness
episodes.plot: A drunken Civil War re-enactment leads to an actual Civil War breaking out.

episodes.title: Mr. Hankey's Christmas Classics
episodes.plot: Mr. Hankey hosts a collection of Christmas songs sung by South Park characters.

episodes.title: Are You There God? It's Me, Jesus
episodes.plot: Stan worries that he is maturing more slowly than his friends. Meanwhile, Jesus feels pressured to perform a miracle at the start of the new millennium.

episodes.title: World Wide Recorder Concert
episodes.plot: The boys feud with New Yorkers at a gathering of elementary school kids. Meanwhile, Mr. Garrison confronts his father.
